tool.name: MetaPhlAn
tool.command:
MetaPhlAn $input1 -o $output1 --input_type $input_type --no_map --bt2_ps $PresetsForBowtie2
#if $str($gchoice_post_mapping.global_choice_post_mapping) == "1": --tax_lev $gchoice_post_mapping.Taxonomic_Level --min_cu_len $gchoice_post_mapping.min_cu_len
#if $str($gchoice_post_mapping.Add_Viruses) == "1": --add_viruses #end if #if $str($gchoice_post_mapping.Ignore_Eukaryotes) == "1": --ignore_eukaryotes #end if #if $str($gchoice_post_mapping.Ignore_Bacteria) == "1": --ignore_bacteria #end if #if $str($gchoice_post_mapping.Ignore_Archaea) == "1": --ignore_archaea #end if
--stat_q $gchoice_post_mapping.stat_q #end if
#if $str($gchoice_additional_analysis_types.global_additional_analysis_types) == "1": -t $gchoice_additional_analysis_types.Analysis_Type #if int($gchoice_additional_analysis_types.nreads) > 0: --nreads $gchoice_additional_analysis_types.nreads #end if
#if int($gchoice_additional_analysis_types.pres_th) > 0: --pres_th $gchoice_additional_analysis_types.pres_th #end if
#if $str($gchoice_additional_analysis_types.clade) != " ": --clade $gchoice_additional_analysis_types.clade #if int($gchoice_additional_analysis_types.min_ab) > 0: --min_ab $gchoice_additional_analysis_types.min_ab #end if #end if
#end if

param.name: PresetsForBowtie2
param.label: Sensitivity options for read-marker similarity (as described by BowTie2)

param.name: min_cu_len
param.label: Minimum total nucleotide length for the markers in a clade

param.name: stat_q
param.label: Quantile value for the robust average

param.name: global_additional_analysis_types
param.label: Display additional analysis types and arguments advanced parameters
param.help: Select additional analysis types and argument advanced choices

param.name: Analysis_Type
param.label: Analysis Type: Type of Analysis to perform
param.option: Profiling a metagenomes in terms of relative abundances
profiling a metagenomes in terms of relative abundances and estimate the number of reads coming from each clade
Mapping from reads to clades (only reads hitting a marker)
Normalized marker counts for clades with at least a non-null marker
Non-normalized marker counts. Use with extreme caution
List of markers present for a specific clade, specified with --clade, and all its subclades
normalized marker counts (only when > 0.0 and normalized by metagenome size if --nreads is specified)
list of markers present in the sample (threshold at 1.0 if not differently specified with --pres_th

param.name: nreads
param.label: The total number of reads in the original metagenome

param.name: pres_th
param.label: Threshold for calling a marker present

param.name: clade
param.label: The clade for clade specific strain tracker analysis

param.name: min_ab
param.label: The minimum percentage abundance for the clade in the clade specific strain tracker analysis

tool.help:
**MetaPhlAn** is a computational tool for profiling the composition of microbial communities (Bacteria, Archaea and Eukaryotes) from metagenomic shotgun sequencing data (i.e. not 16S) with species-level.
.. image:: https://iiif.elifesciences.org/lax:65088%2Felife-65088-fig1-v1.tif/full/1500,/0/default.jpg :height: 500 :width: 600
**MetaPhlAn** features include:
* Unambiguous taxonomic assignments * Accurate estimation of organismal relative abundance * Species-level resolution for bacteria, archaea, eukaryotes and viruses * Metagenomic strain-level population genomics
---------
**Tutorial, User Manual and Forum** ===================================
The Tutorial, User Manual and Forum for MetaPhlAn can be found in the MetaPhlAn_Tutorial_
.. _MetaPhlAn_Tutorial: https://huttenhower.sph.harvard.edu/MetaPhlAn/
**Inputs** ==========
The input file must be a multi-fasta file containing metagenomic reads loaded with the "Get Data" module in the left panel. Reads can be as short as ~40 nt although lengths higher than 70 nt are recommended.
You can find small demo metagenomes in the following location. Please upload it to Galaxy using **Get Data / Upload File** from your computer
- Supragingival_plaque_
.. _Supragingival_plaque: https://github.com/biobakery/galaxy-upgrade/blob/main/metaphlan3/SRS014476-Supragingival_plaque.fasta.gz
**Outputs** ===========
The output is a two column tab-separated plain file reporting the predicted microbial clades present in the metagenomic samples and the corresponding relative abundances.
All taxonomic levels from domain to species will be reported and higher taxonomic levelis contain the sum of the abundances of its taxonomic leaf nodes (usually species) and, possibly, some lower level "unclassified" clades.
.. _MetaPhlAn_Paper: https://elifesciences.org/articles/65088
